This new version fixes a bug that made the app crash when importing comics that already exist in your library.
This new version fixes two bug that made the app crash when importing comics that already exist in your library, and changing the reading direction.

It's been a while since the last version, but we're sure the wait would have worth it.
We wanted to make Panels much more stable, so one of our primary goals in this release was to reduce the crashes and improve performance.

We made Panels more resilient when importing comic files with mismatching file extension and file format. Now, if you add a comic with an invalid file extension, it will be imported gracefully as long as its a valid file format.

Version 1.8.5

We've been working really hard to bring you new and better ways for reading comics.
This new release includes four different reading modes for Premium users:

- Default: page by page navigation (same as before) (Available for everyone)
- Panel

We've added new nice feature:
- Panels now remember the last reading mode you used

And fixed some annoying bugs:
- Fixed a crash when using some of the new reading modes.
- Double tap to zoom works even if you double tap on the edges, inst

- Fixed a crash when presenting the Inbox for the first time

=====

We've added new nice feature:
- Panels now remember the last reading mode you used

And fixed some annoying bugs:
- Fixed a crash when using some of the

Panels 1.10 includes many new features and improves substantially the library experience.
- OneDrive support: Panels now includes Microsoft OneDrive for importing comics
- Recent section: the old recently read bar has been redesign as a new Recent s

- Fix application crash on opening for some users
- Fix progress not updating correctly
- Fix start trial not working properly
- Fix other minor bugs


v1.10.0
=======
Panels 1.10 includes many new features and improves substantial

This new version is completely focused on stability and performance.
- We've improved the experience and stability when importing a large number of comics.
- The library should scroll smoother even regardless of the size of it.
- OneDrive bug t

- Fix application crash on opening for some users
- Fix progress not updating correctly
- Fix start trial not working properly
- Fix other minor bugs


v1.10.0
=======
Panels 1.10 includes many new features and improves substantial

- You can now zoom in manually when using Panels View
- Fixed a bug causing collections name appear as Label label when presented in list mode

- Added compatibility with Ubooquity!
- Fixed bug that make some covers not show/disappear

- We've improved our Ubooquity Server support, adding private users support, and better error handling.
- All the import services now support pagination. At last you can load all the content in your folders no matter how many files they contain.
-

- Fixed thumbnails load in Ubooquity when security users are enabled.
- Fixed files download in Ubooquity when security users are enabled.
- Fixed pagination in Ubooquity in folders containing files and other nested folders.
- Fixed a crash when

New option in settings to disable page transition animations so navigating from one page to the next feels faster.
Also continue reading has been added to all readers!

In addition this version also includes minor improvements and bug fixings:

Edit collection names and delete them by swiping in the collections list.
Preload images: readers now preload the next image, which makes scrolling through a comic faster than ever.
The Library list layout appears in two columns on iPad when using i

The Library list layout appears in two columns on iPad when using i
Fixes a bug with Ubooquity servers using a reverse proxy

This version adds better iOS 13 compatibility.
New in this version: 
- More sorting modes
- Light&dark mode compatibility
- New and improved themes
- Import from external drive (via Files)

Many bugs have been fixed, includin

Introducing Panels Labs: a set of experimental features only available for Premium users.
New Text recognition feature: inside Panels Labs you can now enable text recognition. Your device will read the text for you.

Our main focus for this release was the library. As you will see it now uses a standard tabbar with 4 main screens.

This version fixes:
- Some issues importing comics.
- Automatically dismiss keyboard in search when scrolling.
- Fixes layout in Search after rotating the device.
- Fixes some crashes

---

Welcome to Panels 2.0, the biggest update

This version fixes:

- We've updated our data base engine that fixes some problems. We're aiming to add more stability to the app.
- Fixes the drag n' drop comics import.
- Fixes the comics import from external memories (SD cards, USB drives,

This version fixes:

We've spend some time optimizing the app performance. Importing large amounts of comics and scrolling through big libraries/collections is now smoother.

More performance optimization work. This build aims to improve launch times and scroll performance in large libraries.

====================
